Interface MobileBehavior

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Behavior, java.lang.Cloneable, CMObject, java.lang.Comparable<CMObject>, Contingent, Modifiable, MsgListener, Tickable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Mobile, MobileAggressive, MobileGoodGuardian

    public interface MobileBehavior
extends Behavior
    A MobileBehavior is a Behavior causes a mob to move about
